title: Why Is The Male Lead Seducing Me
alternative_title: Nan Zhu Weihe Gouyin Wo ; Why Did the Male Lead Seduce Me? ; Why is the Male Lead Seducing Me ; Nán Zhǔ Wèihé Gōuyǐn Wǒ ; 男主为何勾引我
status: Nan Zhu Weihe Gouyin Wo ; Why Did the Male Lead Seduce Me? ; Why is the Male Lead Seducing Me ; Nán Zhǔ Wèihé Gōuyǐn Wǒ ; 男主为何勾引我
description:
Description :
        In order to practise the art of seduction, the useless male nine-tailed fox, Tu Shan Qing, was thrown into the "Mirror Flower World" by his sister for training. Moreover, he would not be able to leave until he successfully broke through. However, who could explain to him: Why did the beautiful White Snake in the world of ?The Legend of The White Snake?, disappear and turn into a muscular and aggressive man! He also stabbed him without saying a word? In order to return to the real world, Tu Shan Qing could only bite the bullet  But, why is the way the Male Lead looks at him more and more wrong!
